tool.name: Candidate hi-res mass of predicted low-res fragments
tool.description: Take a MSP file with predicted fragment peaks at low-res and generate the "known features" table of tentative hi-res peaks suitable as input to hybrid apLCMS
tool.help: Use with peak prediction (https://is.muni.cz/auth/th/dz62r/) applied on previous run of apLCMS - RAMClustR - matchMS chain.
